text: The Iceman Cometh is a 1973 American drama movie directed by John Frankenheimer and based on the 1939 play of the same name by Eugene O'Neill. It stars Lee Marvin, Robert Ryan, Jeff Bridges, Fredric March, Bradford Dillman. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1973 drama movies Category:1970s epic movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by John Frankenheimer
title: The Iceman Cometh
